typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		empid as integer,
		Name as string,
		County as string,
		Department as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> cdcfile
source(output(
		empID as integer,
		Name as string,
		County as string,
		Department as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	format: 'table') ~> prevousdata
cdcfile derive(Hashkeynew = sha2(256,County,Department)) ~> newhaskey
prevousdata derive(hashkeyprv = sha2(256, County,Department)) ~> prevoushashkey
newhaskey, prevoushashkey exists(Hashkeynew == hashkeyprv
	&& cdcfile@empid == prevousdata@empID,
	negate:true,
	broadcast: 'auto')~> Exists1
Exists1 sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	input(
		empID as integer,
		Name as string,
		County as string,
		Department as string
	),
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	format: 'table',
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	errorHandlingOption: 'stopOnFirstError',
	mapColumn(
		empID = empid,
		Name,
		County,
		Department
	)) ~> tartget

source(output(
		salesdate as string,
		salesItem as string,
		country as string,
		qunatity as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> sales
sales split(isNull(toDate(salesdate, 'dd-MMM-yyyy')),
	disjoint: false) ~> ConditionalSplit1@(error, Good)
ConditionalSplit1@error derive(Filename = 'SalesIND_2021_MAY_01') ~> filenamecolumn
ConditionalSplit1@Good derive(GDfilename = 'SalesIND_2021_MAY_01') ~> DerivedColumn1
filenamecolumn sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	filePattern:('SalesIND_2021_MAY_01_bad'),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	mapColumn(
		salesdate,
		salesItem,
		country,
		qunatity,
		Filename
	)) ~> BadFile
DerivedColumn1 sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	filePattern:('SalesIND_2021_MAY_01_good'),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> Goodfile

source(output(
		empID as integer,
		Name as string,
		County as string,
		Department as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> scdsrc
scdsrc alterRow(upsertIf(1==1)) ~> AlterRow1
AlterRow1 sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	input(
		empID as integer,
		Name as string,
		County as string,
		Department as string
	),
	deletable:false,
	insertable:false,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:true,
	keys:['empID'],
	format: 'table',
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	errorHandlingOption: 'stopOnFirstError',
	mapColumn(
		empID,
		Name,
		County,
		Department
	)) ~> sink1

source(output(
		ID as integer,
		NAME as string,
		Designation as string,
		PhoneNo as long,
		Location as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> ADLS2
source(output(
		MaxKey as integer
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	query: 'select max(CDCkey) as MaxKey from [dbo].[Teamdeatils_Type2]',
	format: 'query') ~> maxKeyfrmTBL
source(output(
		CDCkey as integer,
		ID as integer,
		playerName as string,
		Desinigination as string,
		ContactNo as long,
		Location as string,
		IsActive as integer,
		Fromdate as date,
		ToDate as date
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	format: 'table') ~> dbsqltbl
ADLS2 select(mapColumn(
		src_ID = ID,
		src_NAME = NAME,
		src_Designation = Designation,
		src_PhoneNo = PhoneNo,
		src_Location = Location
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> aliasedname
aliasedname, maxKeyfrmTBL join(1==1,
	joinType:'cross',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> CrossJoin
CrossJoin, dbsqltbl join(src_ID == ID,
	joinType:'left',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> leftjoinDBtbl
leftjoinDBtbl split(src_ID==ID,
	disjoint: false) ~> Split1@(Match, InsertUnmatched)
Split1@Match, dbsqltbl join(src_Designation == dbsqltbl@Desinigination,
	joinType:'left',
	broadcast: 'right')~> Join1
Join1 split(src_Designation==Split1@Match@Desinigination,
	disjoint: false) ~> ConditionalSplit2@(Match1, Unmatch)
ConditionalSplit2@Match1 alterRow(updateIf(1==1)) ~> AlterRow1
ConditionalSplit2@Unmatch derive(IsActive = 0,
		ToDate = currentDate()) ~> DerivedColumn1
DerivedColumn1 alterRow(updateIf(ConditionalSplit2@Unmatch@CDCkey<=MaxKey)) ~> AlterRow2
Split1@InsertUnmatched sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	input(
		CDCkey as integer,
		ID as integer,
		playerName as string,
		Desinigination as string,
		ContactNo as long,
		Location as string,
		IsActive as integer,
		Fromdate as date,
		ToDate as date
	),
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	format: 'table',
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	errorHandlingOption: 'stopOnFirstError',
	mapColumn(
		ID = src_ID,
		playerName = src_NAME,
		Desinigination = src_Designation,
		ContactNo = src_PhoneNo,
		Location = src_Location,
		IsActive
	)) ~> sink1
AlterRow1 sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	input(
		CDCkey as integer,
		ID as integer,
		playerName as string,
		Desinigination as string,
		ContactNo as long,
		Location as string,
		IsActive as integer,
		Fromdate as date,
		ToDate as date
	),
	deletable:false,
	insertable:false,
	updateable:true,
	upsertable:false,
	keys:['ID'],
	format: 'table',
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	errorHandlingOption: 'stopOnFirstError',
	mapColumn(
		ID = src_ID,
		ContactNo = src_PhoneNo,
		Location = src_Location
	)) ~> sink2
ConditionalSplit2@Unmatch sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	input(
		CDCkey as integer,
		ID as integer,
		playerName as string,
		Desinigination as string,
		ContactNo as long,
		Location as string,
		IsActive as integer,
		Fromdate as date,
		ToDate as date
	),
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	format: 'table',
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	errorHandlingOption: 'stopOnFirstError',
	mapColumn(
		ID = src_ID,
		playerName = src_NAME,
		Desinigination = src_Designation,
		ContactNo = src_PhoneNo,
		Location = src_Location
	)) ~> sink3
AlterRow2 sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	input(
		CDCkey as integer,
		ID as integer,
		playerName as string,
		Desinigination as string,
		ContactNo as long,
		Location as string,
		IsActive as integer,
		Fromdate as date,
		ToDate as date
	),
	deletable:false,
	insertable:false,
	updateable:true,
	upsertable:false,
	keys:['ID'],
	format: 'table',
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	errorHandlingOption: 'stopOnFirstError',
	mapColumn(
		ID = src_ID,
		IsActive,
		ToDate
	)) ~> sink4

source(output(
		id as string,
		name as string,
		gender as string,
		department as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> allemp
source(output(
		name as string,
		gender as string,
		department as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> emplooyes
allemp derive(dummy = 'dummy') ~> DerivedColumn1
DerivedColumn1 aggregate(groupBy(dummy),
	MaxID = max(id)) ~> Aggregate1
Aggregate1, emplooyes join(1==1,
	joinType:'cross',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> Join1
Join1 keyGenerate(output(id as long),
	startAt: 1L) ~> SurrogateKey1
SurrogateKey1 derive(id = toString(toInteger(id)+toInteger(MaxID))) ~> DerivedColumn2
DerivedColumn2 select(mapColumn(
		name,
		gender,
		department,
		id
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> Select1
allemp, Select1 union(byName: true)~> Union1
Union1 sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	input(
		id as string,
		name as string,
		cntry as string,
		depatmnt as string,
		{_c4} as string
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	partitionBy('hash', 1)) ~> targetallemp

source(output(
		Column_1 as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> fixedfile
fixedfile derive(EMPID = substring(Column_1, 1,4),
		EMPNAME = substring(Column_1, 5,10),
		STATE = substring(Column_1, 15,2),
		PHONE = substring(Column_1, 17,10)) ~> DerivedColumn1
DerivedColumn1 select(mapColumn(
		EMPID,
		EMPNAME,
		STATE,
		PHONE
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> requiredcolumns
requiredcolumns sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	filePattern:'fixedtocsv',
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	partitionBy('hash', 1)) ~> csvfile

source(output(
		ProductID as string,
		Name as string,
		ProductNumber as string,
		Color as string,
		StandardCost as string,
		ListPrice as string,
		Size as string,
		Weight as string,
		ProductCategoryID as string,
		ProductModelID as string,
		SellStartDate as string,
		SellEndDate as string,
		ModifiedDate as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> product
source(output(
		ProductCategoryID as string,
		ParentProductCategoryID as string,
		Name as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> prdcatgry
product, prdcatgry join(product@ProductCategoryID == prdcatgry@ProductCategoryID,
	joinType:'inner',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> Joinproductcatgry
Joinproductcatgry sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	mapColumn(
		ProductID,
		Name = product@Name,
		ProductNumber,
		Color,
		StandardCost,
		ListPrice,
		Size,
		Weight,
		ProductCategoryID = product@ProductCategoryID,
		ProductModelID,
		SellStartDate,
		SellEndDate,
		ModifiedDate,
		ParentProductCategoryID,
		productcategoryName = prdcatgry@Name
	)) ~> productoutput

source(output(
		id as string,
		name as string,
		cntry as string,
		depatmnt as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> frnd
source(output(
		id as string,
		name as string,
		cntry as string,
		depatmnt as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> frndnew
frnd, frndnew union(byName: true)~> uniondata
uniondata aggregate(groupBy(id),
	each(match(name!='id'), $$ = first($$))) ~> removedupicate
removedupicate sort(asc(id, true)) ~> sortingid
sortingid sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	filePattern:'nodupilcate.csv',
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	partitionBy('hash', 1)) ~> cleandata

source(output(
		order as string,
		itmname as string,
		quntiry as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> order
order window(asc(quntiry, true),
	Runningqtytotal = sum(toInteger(quntiry))) ~> Window1
Window1 sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	input(
		id as string,
		name as string,
		cntry as string,
		depatmnt as string,
		{_c4} as string
	),
	filePattern:'runningtotal.csv',
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	partitionBy('hash', 1)) ~> tgtruuningtotal

sources.name: src_prd
sources.script:
source(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> src_prd

typeProperties.script:
section Section1;
shared src_prd = let
  AdfDoc = AzureStorage.BlobContents("https://sourceinput527.blob.core.windows.net/adfnput/Product.csv"),
  Csv = Csv.Document(AdfDoc, [Delimiter = ",", Encoding = TextEncoding.Utf8, QuoteStyle = QuoteStyle.Csv]),
  PromotedHeaders = Table.PromoteHeaders(Csv, [PromoteAllScalars = true])
in
  PromotedHeaders;
shared UserQuery = let
  Source = src_prd,
  #"Renamed columns" = Table.RenameColumns(Source, {{"ModifiedDate", "product"}}),
  #"Removed columns" = Table.RemoveColumns(#"Renamed columns", {"SellStartDate"})
in
  #"Removed columns";
